bool Mesquite::TShapeNB1::evaluate_with_hess ( const MsqMatrix< 2, 2 > &  T,
double &  result,
MsqMatrix< 2, 2 > &  deriv_wrt_T,
MsqMatrix< 2, 2 >  second_wrt_T[3],
MsqError &  err 
) [virtual]

Hessian of with respect to components of T.

Parameters:
T 3x3 relative measure matrix (typically A W^-1)
result Output: value of function
deriv_wrt_T Output: partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, evaluated at passed T.
second_wrt_T Output: 9x9 matrix of second partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, in row-major order. The symmetric matrix is decomposed into 3x3 blocks and only the upper diagonal blocks, in row-major order, are returned.

Returns:
false if function cannot be evaluated for given T (e.g. division by zero, etc.), true otherwise.

Reimplemented from Mesquite::TMetric.

MsqMatrix< 3, 3 > &  deriv_wrt_T,
MsqMatrix< 3, 3 >  second_wrt_T[6],
MsqError &  err 
) [virtual]

Hessian of with respect to components of T.

Parameters:
T 3x3 relative measure matrix (typically A W^-1)
result Output: value of function
deriv_wrt_T Output: partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, evaluated at passed T.
second_wrt_T Output: 9x9 matrix of second partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, in row-major order. The symmetric matrix is decomposed into 3x3 blocks and only the upper diagonal blocks, in row-major order, are returned.

Returns:
false if function cannot be evaluated for given T (e.g. division by zero, etc.), true otherwise.
